revised_title: Advanced Theoretical Model of Stress Transfer in Uniaxially Fiber-Reinforced Composites
tldr: The authors developed a new analytical method to predict stress transfer between fiber and matrix in uniaxially fiber-reinforced composites, considering factors like thermal residual stresses, Poisson ratio mismatches, and frictional slip at the fiber-matrix interface. This theoretical approach can help investigate stress transfer in fiber-reinforced composites in more detail than before, providing insights into composite modeling and potential applications.
